name: You are the Monster (igd)
description:
The night is dark. A stranger walks into town. They claim to be a hunter. A hunter of monsters.

In the darkened hall, someone tries to scream but the creature is too fast. Human skin slumps to the floor, discarded like dirty clothes.

This is a one keyboard, two person game. One person plays as the creature while the other plays as the hunter. The creature must kill everyone in the hall. The hunter must kill the creature, saving the villagers.

The hunter carries the only light source. The creature wears the skin of its previous victim to blend in. Controls and instructions can be found in-game.
